Arcane Meal: You gain a bonus to damage with spells equal to your level. This bonus is halved on spells that target more than one creature.
Chilled Meal: You suffer no penalty from hot climates.
Hearty Meal: Whenever you would be healed, roll the dice twice, taking the higher of the two results.
Mighty Meal: You add +1 to attack rolls with weapon attacks.
Spicy Meal: You suffer no penalty from cold climates.
Tough Meal: Your current hit points and your hit point maximum increased by an amount equal to your level.
